channel.title: CVE Feed for Sony Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sony Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-5589|2024-08-04T08:30:24.643Z -- sony%20corporation -- sony%20wireless%20headphones%20wf-1000x%2C%20wf-sp700n%2C%20wh-1000xm2%2C%20wh-1000xm3%2C%20wh-ch700n%2C%20wh-h900n%2C%20wh-xb700%2C%20wh-xb900n%2C%20wi-1000x%2C%20wi-c600n%2C%20wi-sp600n
item.description: SONY Wireless Headphones WF-1000X, WF-SP700N, WH-1000XM2, WH-1000XM3, WH-CH700N, WH-H900N, WH-XB700, WH-XB900N, WI-1000X, WI-C600N and WI-SP600N with firmware versions prior to 4.5.2 have vulnerability that someone within the Bluetooth range can make the Bluetooth pairing and operate such as changing volume of the product.
